data.title: Rose McGowan Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Rose McGowan with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Spent part of her childhood in a commune in Italy, where her father ran a chapter of the Children of God movement (the same religious group in which fellow thespians River and Joaquin Phoenix were raised)

Attended beauty and art schools in Seattle before moving to Los Angeles and pursuing acting

Nominated for an Independent Spirit Award (Best Debut Performance) in 1996 for her work in The Doom Generation (1995)

Sang backup vocals on Marilyn Manson's "Posthuman," a track on his 1998 album, Mechanical Animals

Caused a huge stir with the barely there dress she wore to the 1998 MTV Movie Awards

Is a fan of the Boston Terrier dog breed, and has done volunteer work for the non-profit group Boston Terrier Rescue Net
